title: Forecast Google Glass unit sales 2014 to 2018
summary: Fast casual restaurant chain firehouse subs generated sales of 794 million u.s. dollars from its u.s. establishments in 2018 . This figure has risen by over 240 million in the past five years . Leading u.s. sandwich chains In terms of systemwide sales , firehouse subs placed fifth in a ranking of leading u.s. sandwich restaurant chains , including Subway , Arby 's and Jimmy John 's , in 2018 .
gold: Here you can see a forecast for the sale of Google Glasses from 2014 to 2018 . The source predicts that Google 's product will sell well and that by 2018 will sell more than 21 million units .
